channel.title: Dragon Full Helm & Neitiznot Helm IDs for Dogs Client v7
channel.description:
ok, i got the new dogs client v7, and it wotks great. there is just one problem:
the ids for the helm of neitiznot and the drag full helm are 2178 and 2179. well, my game already has a spot for those and it keeps thinking of the objects before the helmets when i add them to ITEM4.java, so it always thinks of the helmets as a wep. how can i fix this?

barrage, maybe you could help me with the portal issue?

And what are these portal issuses I could help with?

item.title: Dragon Full Helm & Neitiznot Helm IDs for Dogs Client v7
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

[quote=“Carson, post:3, topic:172987”]I got a idea for you.

You post ALOT of help threads.

Make a new post called “Help Me Here”

Then post all your questions there, i’m tired of seeing you’re name everywhere.

It’s annoying tbh.[/quote]

Shut up if your not going to help.

Go into item.CFG and delete the ids for 2178 and 2179 but dont delete the drags full helm and the helm of neitiznot.

Hope it helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Full Helm & Neitiznot Helm IDs for Dogs Client v7
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

im using czar’s source.

sofar, ive added to the items:

drag full helm
all godswords
all elegant
bandos full
anarkyl full
dragon boots
dark bow
dragon arrow
all the extra whips for dogs
all the extra santas for dogs
all the extra phats for dogs
all skillcapes, (t) and regular, and all hoods
all 3rd age armor

i cant think of any more right now.
ive also made my own emote tabs to places, such as the duel arena.
ive put in about 10 new commands, including only (::commands) that gives you a list of all the commands, and it is organized by playerRights.

i have also added about 20 objects, 2 of which i made a case that added items to the inventory.

the list goes on…

[EDIT]

ok, i have found some new problems to lay on you guys.

  1. i want to be able to use a certain item with a player, and when i do, it throws the item at the player. ive only seen tuts on using items w/ items or objects so… yeah

  2. this is the one im really trying for, and it keeps messing up. i tried to make a portal with multiple options:

case 4388: if(actionTimer == 0) { selectOption("Where would you like to go?", "Low level open fights (lvls 3-90)", "Low level obstacle fights", "High level open fights (lvls 90-183)", "High level obstacle fights", ""); optionObject == 4388; break;

ok, i put that in the //portals section. does that work? i put these in the options section:

else if(OptionObject == 4388) { //low level open fights teleportToX = ____; teleportToY = ____; sendMessage("Duel!") OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

after the next break i put this for option 2:

else if(OptionObject == 4388) { //low level obstacle fights teleportToX = ____; teleportToY = ____; sendMessage("Duel!") OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

and for option 3:

else if(OptionObject == 4388) { //high level open fights teleportToX = ____; teleportToY = ____; sendMessage("Duel!") OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

option 4:

else if(OptionObject == 4388) { //high level obstacle fights teleportToX = ____; teleportToY = ____; sendMessage("Duel!") OptionObject = -1; RemoveAllWindows(); }

ok, so did i do this right? because i keep getting a message in the compiler saying:

(java.lang.code, java.lang.code...) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.code, java.lang.code,...)

help plz

Read full topic

no, i idnt say this was the wrong sectiona. i said this was a question for DOG HIMSELF because its his client. he should deal with it, if its a moparscape problem then ok. post here. but otherwise GO ASK THE CREATOR.

item.title: Dragon Full Helm & Neitiznot Helm IDs for Dogs Client v7
item.dc:creator: @IamMutedAtm IamMutedAtm
item.description:
@IamMutedAtm wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:9, topic:172987”][quote author=Carson link=topic=233206.msg1994140#msg1994140 date=1200239388]
Not the wrong forum, or website.

He needs help, and it can also be a question.

/LiekEpicPhail.
[/quote][quote author=IamMutedAtm link=topic=233206.msg1994147#msg1994147 date=1200239688]

this is completly in the wron forum, infact the wrong website tbh…

To be honest, you are a complete moron.

Anyways what I said to do was the correct way to fix it.

Go into your Class8.java,

Press Ctrl + f

Find the Id you want to change…

Pick a higher number that isn’t already in use…

Voila.

Problem Fixed.
[/quote]

You are both idiots, it IS the wrong forum, this is a question for dog eats dog, as its his client he needs to fix problems/answer peoples questions. Not to have the moparisthebest.com forums spammed up with people who have no clue.[/quote]

Yet again, this is the proper section.
Private server refers to both server and client.

Ask dog even, he says hes been muted for posting help in the client hacking section.
So you got anything to top that?

Read full topic

Go into your Class8.java,

Pick a higher number that isn’t already in use…

Voila.

Problem Fixed.[/quote]

You are both idiots, it IS the wrong forum, this is a question for dog eats dog, as its his client he needs to fix problems/answer peoples questions. Not to have the moparisthebest.com forums spammed up with people who have no clue.

item.dc:creator: @IamMutedAtm IamMutedAtm
item.description:
@IamMutedAtm wrote:

[quote=“R4ND0M, post:1, topic:172987”]ok, i got the new dogs client v7, and it wotks great. there is just one problem:

the ids for the helm of neitiznot and the drag full helm are 2178 and 2179. well, my game already has a spot for those and it keeps thinking of the objects before the helmets when i add them to ITEM4.java, so it always thinks of the helmets as a wep. how can i fix this?[/quote]

Change the ID’s in class8.java to higher IDS that are not already being used.
